fields.headline: Marketing
fields.bodyText: Britannia Music is to be rebranded by design agency Wolff Olins. Npower is moving into the property business by offering a fast conveyancing service. Nokia is hoping to corner the market in luxury mobiles with a premium product selling for up to £15,000. GlaxoSmithkline has dropped its Plenty range of fruit drinks after failing to convince consumers. The Australian Tourism Commission is lobbying lager companies in an attempt to persuade them to avoid using laddish Aussie clichés in their advertising.
